channel.title: Settlement Watch
channel.description: Legal settlements from courts and regulators

item.title: [$556M] Kaiser Permanente Medicare Fraud Settlement
item.description: Kaiser Permanente pays $556 million in record Medicare Advantage fraud settlement. Largest Medicare Advantage recovery.

item.title: [$9.5M] Stericycle Hazardous Waste Settlement
item.description: DOJ and EPA settle with Stericycle over hazardous waste violations.

item.title: [$40M] Cencora/Lash Group Data Breach Settlement
item.description: Cencora and Lash Group data breach class action settlement. Up to $5,000 per claimant.

item.title: [$1.5B] Anthropic AI Copyright Settlement
item.description: Anthropic agrees to pay authors at least $1.5 billion to settle copyright lawsuit over AI training data.

item.title: [$100M] Verizon Administrative Charges Settlement
item.description: Verizon class action over administrative charges. Check eligibility.

item.title: [$150M] Atlantic Richfield EPA Superfund Settlement
item.description: EPA and Montana settle with Atlantic Richfield for Superfund site cleanup. Environmental remediation required.

item.title: [$12.5M] Cash App Text Message Settlement
item.description: Cash App $12.5M text message class action settlement. TCPA violations. Payments of $394 per claimant.

item.title: [$80M] Kia Vehicle Theft Settlement
item.description: Kia $80 million settlement for vehicle theft claims. TikTok challenge-related thefts.

item.title: [$425M] Teva Pharmaceuticals DOJ Settlement
item.description: Teva Pharmaceuticals agrees to pay $425 million to resolve DOJ investigation. False Claims Act enforcement.

item.title: [$23M] TransUnion Credit Report Settlement
item.description: TransUnion settles credit report dispute claims.

item.title: [$100M] Vanguard SEC Settlement
item.description: Vanguard to pay more than $100 million to resolve SEC violations. Securities enforcement action.

item.title: [$30M] 23andMe Data Breach Settlement
item.description: 23andMe data breach multidistrict litigation settlement. Genetic data exposure claims.

item.title: [$2.5B] FTC vs Amazon Prime Settlement
item.description: FTC secures historic $2.5 billion settlement against Amazon for Prime subscription practices. Record consumer protection enforcement.

item.title: [$15M] Liberty University - Falwell Jr. Settlement
item.description: Liberty University pays former president Jerry Falwell Jr. in private settlement.

item.title: [$425M] Capital One Data Breach Class Action
item.description: Capital One data breach settlement payments ongoing. Affected customers eligible.

item.title: [$177M] AT&T Data Breach Settlement
item.description: AT&T data breach class action settlement. Deadline extended - file claims for up to $7,500.

item.title: [$720M] National Opioid Settlement (Michigan AG)
item.description: Michigan AG Nessel secures $720 million national opioid settlement. Multistate enforcement action.

item.title: [$7M] Bowflex Treadmill Class Action
item.description: Bowflex treadmill settlement gets preliminary approval. Product defect claims.

item.title: [$1.2M] GameSpot Privacy Class Action
item.description: GameSpot privacy settlement. Claims currently open.

item.title: [$1B] Bard Hernia Mesh MDL Settlement
item.description: Bard hernia mesh litigation reaches $1 billion settlement. Mass tort MDL for defective medical devices.

item.title: [$500M] Harvard-Trump Antisemitism Settlement
item.description: Harvard nearing federal settlement agreement over antisemitism claims. $500 million payment discussed.

item.title: [$1.83M] Golden Corral Data Breach Settlement
item.description: Golden Corral restaurant data breach settlement. Claims open.

item.title: [$350M] Walgreens Opioid Settlement
item.description: Walgreens agrees to pay up to $350 million in opioid crisis settlement.

item.title: [$33.75M] Multiplan Healthcare Class Action
item.description: Multiplan reaches $33.75M payment in healthcare class action lawsuit.

item.title: [$243M] Tesla Autopilot Verdict
item.description: Tesla lost $243M verdict after rejecting $60M settlement offer in Autopilot case.

item.title: [$68M] Google Voice Assistant Privacy Settlement
item.description: Google settles privacy claims related to Voice Assistant data collection.

item.title: [$199.5M] Visa Mastercard Merchant Settlement
item.description: Visa and Mastercard settle merchant class action over interchange fees. Claims being processed.

item.title: [$1.38B] Texas vs Google Privacy Settlement
item.description: Texas Attorney General secures historic $1.38 billion settlement with Google over privacy violations.

item.title: [$4.6M] Target Automatic Payment Settlement
item.description: Target ordered to send automatic checks to qualifying customers.

item.title: [$92M] TikTok Privacy Settlement
item.description: Federal court approves $92 million TikTok privacy settlement. Data collection practices class action.

item.title: [$20M] Keller Williams Homebuyer Class Action
item.description: Keller Williams real estate brokerage settles homebuyer class action. Related to NAR commission practices.

item.title: [$1.6M] Cummins Inc. Securities Settlement
item.description: Cummins Inc. securities class action settlement.

item.title: [$46M] Kaiser Permanente Data Settlement
item.description: Kaiser Permanente members eligible for cash payments in $46 million settlement. Check eligibility.

item.title: [$2.67B] Blue Cross Blue Shield Antitrust Settlement
item.description: Blue Cross Blue Shield antitrust settlement payments finally being distributed. One of the largest healthcare settlements.

item.title: [$700M] Google Play Store Antitrust Settlement
item.description: Google settles Play Store antitrust claims. Class members may qualify for payments.

item.title: [$233M] Disney Employee Wage Settlement
item.description: Disney $233 million settlement with employees wins final approval. Wage and labor class action.

item.title: [$202M] Gilead Sciences Kickbacks Settlement
item.description: Gilead Sciences settles DOJ claims over speaker programs used to pay kickbacks to doctors. Federal fraud enforcement action.

item.title: [$30M] Match.com Reverse Spinoff Settlement
item.description: Match.com settles shareholder suit in Delaware Chancery Court.

item.title: Durham Puts Opioid Settlement Funds Towards Mobile Treatment
item.description: The initial contract for the opioid settlement funding is for three years. Funding won’t be officially released until the city council approves its consent agenda at the March 17 city council...

item.title: Opioid settlement money allocated to Maryland is "rejected" by...
item.description: Baltimore “rejected” the state settlement as “woefully inadequate in addressing the multibillion-dollar problem,” of the opioid crisis, the city law office said in an emailed statement.

item.title: Lack of transparency concerns over billions in Opioid settlement ...
item.description: Concern that opioid settlement money might not be spent to help prevent opioid deaths and addiction is heightened, after what happened with the big tobacco settlement in the 1990's.

item.title: [$335 million] Google News - Viatris reaches $335 million settlement for opioid ...
item.description: Latest opioid settlement nets $355M from Mylan, about $9M for Illinois.Viatris reaches $335 million opioid settlement framework. 17 hours ago. Save for later.

item.title: [$450M] Teva hands over $450M to resolve kickback lawsuits involving ...
item.description: Oct 11, 2024 · Teva Pharmaceuticals USA and Teva Neuroscience have agreed to pay a combined $450 million to resolve claims that the company violated the country’s Anti- Kickback Statute (AKS) and the False...

item.title: [$27.5M] $27.5M Kickback Settlement Highlights DOJ Enforcement
item.description: Aug 1, 2025 · The total $114.5 million in combined judgments and settlements resolved allegations of a genetic testing kickback scheme involving a laboratory paying for illegal referrals for expensive cancer genetic tests that were billed to Medicaid.

item.title: [$425 Million] Teva Pharmaceuticals Agrees to Pay $425 Million to Resolve ...
item.description: Oct 10, 2024 · The settlement was reached after the government’s review of Teva’s financial disclosures concerning its financial condition. This settlement is the latest in a string of enforcement actions against pharmaceutical companies that allegedly used third-party foundations as conduits to pay kickbacks .

item.title: [$9 Million] $9 Million Healthcare Kickback Settlement | Miller Shah LLP ...
item.description: Jul 2, 2025 · Mahlega Abdsharafat and Creative Hospice reached a $9 million settlement resolving allegations of healthcare kickbacks violating the False Claims Act and AKS.

item.title: The effect of federal and state off - label marketing investigations on...
item.description: One of the largest-ever off - label prosecutions relates to the atypical antipsychotic drug olanzapine (Zyprexa).We began by examining the effect of the January 2009 federal settlement .

item.title: [$19.5 million] Bristol-Myers to pay $19.5 million in Abilify off - label ... | Fierce Pharma
item.description: Like the new state settlement , that whistleblower suit cited promotions to pediatric psychiatrists as evidence of off - label marketing.

item.title: (PDF) The Relationship Between Overall Utilization And Settlements...
item.description: Objective 1.5.8 Examine how the settlement amounts compare to utilization (measured in units) allocated to off - label uses and non-evidence based uses.

item.title: List of off-label promotion pharmaceutical settlements
item.description: List of off - label promotion pharmaceutical settlements The following are settlements reached with US authorities against pharmaceutical companies to resolve allegations of " off - label " promotion of drugs.
